meanings.sent1: He couldn't control himself and jizzed in his pants.
meanings.sent2: The man jizzed quickly after watching the adult film.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked about accidentally jizzing on his new shoes.
meanings.sent4: The pressure was building up inside him until he finally jizzed like a shaken soda can.
meanings.sent5: The teenager's face turned red as he tried to hide the fact that he had just jizzed.

meanings.sent1: The doctor examined the jiz sample under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The crime scene investigator found jiz stains on the bedsheet.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally spilled jiz into the soup, creating an unexpected flavor.
meanings.sent4: The artist used jiz as an unconventional medium for his painting.
meanings.sent5: The scientist studied the composition of jiz to understand its properties better.
